translations.translation: nor do you urge the feeding of the poor;
Nor do you urge one another to feed the poor,
and do not urge one another to feed the poor,
or urge one another to feed the destitute?
And do not urge one another to feed the needy.
And urge not one another on the feeding of the Miskin!
Nor do you urge one another to feed the poor,
and you urge not the feeding of the needy,
And urge not on the feeding of the poor.
nor do you urge one another to feed the poor,
Nor urge upon each other the feeding of the poor,
and do not urge the feeding of the needy.
Nor do ye encourage one another to feed the poor!-
And urge not on the feeding of AlMiskin (the poor)!
nor do you urge one another to feed the needy.
And you do not urge the feeding of the poor.
And you do not encourage one another to feed the poor.
[89:18] and they do not urge, neither themselves nor others, the feeding of the needy;
(And urge not) yourselves or others (on the feeding of the poor) giving alms to the poor,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَلاَ تَحَآضُّونَ } أي: لا تأمرون غيركم { عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلْمِسْكِينِ } [الفجر: 18] وإطعامه
